cast.overview: Obsessive master thief Neil McCauley leads a top-notch crew on various daring heists throughout Los Angeles while determined detective Vincent Hanna pursues him without rest. Each man recognizes and respects the ability and the dedication of the other even though they are aware their cat-and-mouse game may end in violence.
cast.title: Heat

details.biography: Patricia Healy is an American actress who was born in Egypt. She began acting in 1991 as Charlene in the erotic made-for-television thriller film Sweet Poison, co-starring Steven Bauer. She was known for General Hospital (in the role of Tammy Carson from March 27, 1998, to July 28, 2000), Heat (1995) and The Bodyguard (1992).
details.name: Patricia Healy
